detail_desc: Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a jacquard-knit motif on the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trousers in a soft cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and smocked hems.
Jumper in a soft fine cotton knit with buttons on one shoulder, raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short coat in a soft wool blend with notch lapels and one button at the front. Dropped shoulders and a short, rounded slit at the cuffs. Welt side pockets and rounded slits in the sides. Unlined.

Double-breasted pea coat in a felted wool blend containing some cashmere. Detachable pile collar, peak lapels and buttons down the front. Welt side pockets, two inner pockets, one with a button, and sleeves with an adjustable tab and button at the cuffs. Lined.
Slides in leather with a toe strap. Leather insoles and rubber soles.

Short dress in woven fabric with notch lapels, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Padded jacket in wind- and water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, fleece-lined hood that is elasticated at the sides. Zip and wind flap with a hook and loop fastener down the front and a chin guard at the top. Zipped chest pocket, with a reflective tab, elasticated cuffs and a fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Ankle-length suit trousers in an airy linen weave with a zip fly and hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, welt back pockets and gently tapered legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit decorated with sparkly stones on the front.

Calf-length dress in a crinkled weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck, and flounces at the front that continue over the shoulders and down the back. Elasticated seam and tie belt below the bust, and a double layer at the front with deep armholes and a wrapover lining for easier nursing access. Lined.
Swimsuit in lightweight scuba fabric with a zip at the front, wide shoulder straps and a cut-out section at the back. Laser-cut edges and decorative flatlock seams.

Lightly padded parka in woven fabric with a brushed velvety finish. Detachable, lined hood with a quilted edge and fake drawstring with leather details, a stand-up collar, zip with a chin guard and wind flap with toggles. Patch front pockets with a flap and button, fake welt chest pockets, a small appliqué on one sleeve, inner ribbing at the cuffs and a single back vent. Removable lining.
Sarong in an airy weave. Size 130x150 cm.
Fitted polo-neck top in ribbed jersey with a cut-out section at the back and long sleeves.
Wrapover bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves and press-studs at the side and crotch.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder jersey top in a soft viscose blend with a V-neck front and back and long sleeves.
Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Shirt dress in a stripe-print viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Pyjama T-shirt and shorts in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a print motif on the front and shorts with an elasticated waist.

V-neck blouse in an airy weave with a slight sheen and velvety-smooth finish. Stand-up collar, long sleeves, wide cuffs with covered buttons, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jersey leggings with an elasticated waist and sewn-in pin-tucks on the legs.

Suit trousers in a stretch cotton weave with an extended waistband, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Metal rings in various designs.

Set with a long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey and twill dungarees. Top with press-studs on one shoulder. Dungarees with adjustable straps with press-studs, a chest pocket and a seam at the waist. Fake front and back pockets, one leg pocket, press-studs at the sides and concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs in sizes 4-12M.

Soft nursing bras in organic cotton jersey with jersey-lined, opening cups with space for nursing pads. Decorative lace trims, slightly wider, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.

Body in lace with a cut-out section at the front and a super push-up bra with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Lined gusset with concealed press-studs and medium coverage at the back.

Short lace dress with short sleeves, a lace section with an opening at the back, and a concealed button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist, a concealed zip at the back and a gently flared skirt. Partly lined in jersey.
Long-sleeved, checked shirt in a soft viscose weave with a brushed finish. Small frilled collar, flounces over the shoulders, buttons down the front and at the cuffs and a rounded hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a V-neck and decorative knot at the front. Long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved football shirt in fast-drying functional fabric with print motifs front and back.
Large shopper in crocodile-patterned, imitation patent leather with two handles and a metal fastener at the top and imitation suede inside. Unlined. Depth 16 cm. Height 28 cm. Width 38 cm.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Cropped, boxy-style jumper in a loose, chunky, crocheted cotton blend. V-neck, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves that taper to the cuffs. The jumper is heavy and should be stored flat to retain its shape.

Fully lined sports bra in extra-sturdy, fast-drying functional fabric that shapes and sculpts the bust. Removable inserts, a racer back and a wide, double-layered hem with a scalloped edge. Extra firm support.
Calf-length trousers in an airy linen and cotton weave. Regular waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, diagonal side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Push-up bra in microfibre with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a lace racer back and a metal fastener at the front.
Fine-knit jumper in a relaxed fit with a draped polo neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short cardigan knitted in soft tape yarn with a V-neck, long sleeves and a wrapover front with ties at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft slub cotton jersey with a chest pocket and ribbing around the neckline.
Full-length leggings in sturdy jersey made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend. High waist with concealed elastication, sewn-in creases down the front and back and a concealed zip at the front of the hems.
Cropped vest top in stretch, ribbed cotton jersey in a narrow cut at the top with a racer back.
Bustier in a cotton weave with a bow on the front, grosgrain shoulder straps and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Baby Exclusive. Romper suit in an organic cotton knit with short, frilled sleeves, buttons at the back and ribbed hems.
Calf-length skirt in a crêpe weave. High waist with covered elastication, and a gathered seam at the hem. Lined with a short jersey skirt.
Short skirt in soft twill with eyelets and lacing at the front and a concealed zip and button at the back. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Short, wide sleeves that finish at the elbows, and a smocked seam at the waist.
5-pocket skinny-fit jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and raw-edge hems.

Set with a strappy top, top and pair of leggings in soft cotton jersey. Strappy top with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps. Top with short sleeves. Both with gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy. Leggings with a wide waist panel.
Straight-style shirt in linen with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Short dress in woven fabric with a round neckline trimmed with a decorative, embroidered band. V-neck opening at the front with twisted ties at the top and long sleeves with smocked cuffs. Gathered seam with a small frill trim at the waist and a skirt with a flounced hem. Unlined.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and contrasting colour trims.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in stretch cotton jersey with a collar and button placket. Slim fit.
Dress in a soft knit containing some wool with a round neckline and long sleeves. Motif with sewn-on sequins at the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Push-up bras in microfibre with mesh details. Underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a pompom on top.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline.
Baby Exclusive. Jumper in soft, fine-knit organic cotton with a heart pattern. Buttons at the back, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
STUDIO COLLECTION. 5-pocket jeans in slightly stretchy denim with a high waist, button fly and wide, straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with an elasticated waist, fake fly and side pockets. Tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a foldover edge at the top, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, a small embroidered detail on the chest and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour in the inside of the collar and cuffs.
Short top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a drawstring hood. Worn details, reverse-stitched seams, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves.

Friendship tops in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an embroidered motif on the front. Round neckline, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Metal earrings. Length 5.5 cm.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with pointed toes, covered block heels and a zip in one side. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Imitation leather sandals. Straps with adjustable fasteners and soft, moulded rubber soles.
Jumper in a textured cotton-blend knit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Shirt in woven fabric with a grandad collar, button placket and chest pocket. Long sleeves with a tab and button and buttoned cuffs.
Tube scarf in a cotton knit with ribbed edges. Length 23 cm, circumference approx. 43 cm.
Scarf in a soft cashmere knit. Size 60x180 cm.
Slingbacks with pointed toes, covered heels and an ankle strap that is elasticated at the back. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and smooth soles. Heel 6 cm.
Blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit with a round neckline and ribbed trims.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft brushed twill with a small embroidered detail on the chest, buttoned cuffs and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs.
Joggers in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a regular, elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a fake back pocket. Tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood and deep V-neck with lacing at the front. Low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.

Calf-length dress in airy, viscose chiffon crêpe with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck and long raglan sleeves with elastication, pin-tucks and a frill at the cuffs. Gathered, elasticated seams at the hips with pin-tucks and a flared skirt. Airy lining.
